category.name: wcf.global
category.item:
This installations-assistant will help you to setup
WoltLab Community Framework{if $setupPackageName != 'WoltLab Community Framework'} and {$setupPackageName}{/if}.
The assistants language is currently set to English.
Please read the following License Agreement. Use the scrollbar to view the whole document.
Do you accept the terms and conditions of the License Agreement? You may only install this software upon acceptance of the License Agreement.
You must accept the License Agreement to continue this installation.
Installed version of the Script language "PHP"
The installed version of the Script language "PHP" is too old for a stable operation of this Software. To proceed with the installation, a version update is necessary.
Your PHP Version is obsolete. For a stable operation of this Software, we recommend a PHP version of 5.0.5 or greater.
"MySQL" Database support is required to install this Software.
The current configuration of the installed "PHP" makes it impossible to upload any files. Due to this configuration, some features of this Software will be restricted.
Installed version of the graphics library "GDLib"
The graphics library "GDLib" is needed for the Dynamic Generation of Images. Without this, some features of this Software will not be available.
Without this library, the Software can only be used with Western European languages.
Security option of "safe mode" in the "PHP" Script language
To quarantee the operation of this Software, we recommend to disable the safe mode setting.
The data transfer library for FTP
With the security option of "safe mode" being enabled, the data transfer library is needed for most of the file operations within this Software. We strongly recommend to enable this library.
All files of WoltLab Community Framework will be extracted into the installation folder.

The installation assistant has found a previous installation of WoltLab Community Framework in the "{$foundDirectory}" folder.
If you would like to install a new copy of the WoltLab Community Framework, then please enter an alternative installation folder.
Please enter the installation folder for WoltLab Community Framework.
After installation into the given folder you can access WoltLab Community Framework through the following URL:
The given folder is not valid.

With the PHP-SafeMode security option being enabled, WoltLab Community Framework can only be installed using FTP functionality. Please enter here the FTP Username and Password for this Server. The information given will not be saved and is only required for the installation of this Package. For this reason alone, further FTP Username and Password requests will be needed.
A connection to the given FTP server could not be made.
The installation is currently loading the next step, please wait.
This Software can support multiple languages. Please choose the languages you would like to install.

The Character Encoding, also known as the Character Set or the Code page determines the storage type and the representation of the installed languages of this System. Please be aware that once you have set your chosen Character Encoding, this can not be changed afterwards.
Please choose at least one language!
The languages you have chosen do not correspond to the given Character Encoding you made previously. Please amend your language choice.
The Data for this Software needs to be stored in a MySQL Database. Please enter your Database access information!

An Error has accured while trying to connect to your Database:
{$exception->getMessage()}{if $exception|get_class == 'DatabaseException'}
{$exception->getErrorDesc()}{/if}
Additional information can be found in the WoltLab Error Reference:
http://www.woltlab.com/help/?code={@$exception->getCode()}

The following table{if $conflictedTables|count > 1}s{/if} already exist{if $conflictedTables|count == 1}s{/if} within your "{$dbName}" Database:
{implode from=$conflictedTables item="table"}{$table}{/implode}.

To solve this problem, please do one of the following:
1. Enable the "Overwrite" option below to overwrite {if $conflictedTables|count > 1}these tables{else}this table{/if} and continue the installation with the "Next" Button or
2. You re-enter the Database access information, but to a different Database and continue the installation with the "Next" Button or
3. You enter a new Installations number, not forgetting to continue the installation with the "Next" Button.
The Installation will now generate an Administrator account for you. Please give a username, email address and password.
Errors have accured while registering the User account, please check the marked fields for errors.
This field can not be left empty.
The Username you have given is invalid. A valid Username must be between 3 and 20 characters long.
The E-Mail Address you have given is invalid. A valid E-Mail Address must be in the format of name@domain.tld
The E-Mail Addresses you have given are not identical. For security reasons, please make sure that both E-Mail Address fields have been filled in and are identical.
The Passwords you have given are not identical. For security reasons, please make sure that both Password fields have been filled in and are identical.

An Error has accured while extracting the required files:
{$exception->getMessage()}
Please make sure that the destination folder exists and can be written to.

Additional information can be found in the WoltLab Error Reference:
http://www.woltlab.com/help/?code={@$exception->getCode()}
